mapper.select: SELECT mrch_id, mrch_id as validate_id, account, password, description, type, locked, state, is_deleted, version_num, version_begin_time, version_expire_time, create_manager_id, update_manager_id, create_time, update_time FROM weiit_merchant where is_deleted = 0 and account = #{account}
mapper.insert: insert into weiit_merchant (account, password, description, type, locked, state, is_deleted, version_num, version_begin_time, version_expire_time, create_manager_id, update_manager_id, create_time, update_time) values (#{account}, #{password}, #{description}, #{type}, 0, 0, 0, #{version_num}, now(), #{version_expire_time}, #{create_manager_id}, #{update_manager_id}, now(), now());
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM system_notify_phone v where business_type = #{business_type} limit 1
